content.description: The session on PDND has expired. You are about to be redirected to the Members Area

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason for rejecting the service request. Min 20 characters, max 1000 characters

subtitle.changePlan: By rejecting this plan change, the consumer will still be able to use the previously available quota.
subtitle.newPurpose: By rejecting this purpose, the consumer will not be able to access the data for your e-service.

infoLabel.changePlan: Enter the reason for rejecting the plan change. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters
infoLabel.newPurpose: Enter the reason for rejecting the purpose. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

content.subtitle: A more recent version of the e-service <1>{{eservice}}, version {{version}}</1>, produced by {{provider}}, has been published.

description.title: What does it mean?
description.content: When a producer publishes a new version of an e-service, there are changes compared to the previous one. These changes may be administrative, technical, or both. Have questions? <1>Check the guide.</1>

checkboxesForm.title: What is recommended before updating?
checkboxesForm.attributesCheckLabel: Administrative staff have verified compliance with the requirements (attributes) requested by the producer.
checkboxesForm.apiIntegrationCheckLabel: Technical staff have verified that your integration matches the updated API of the e-service.
checkboxesForm.testEnvCheckLabel: Technical staff have tested the integration with the updated e-service in the testing environment (if available).

content.missingVerifiedOrDeclaredAttributesAlert: The new request will not be active immediately, your party does not have all the required attributes. A draft will be created that you will be asked to complete. Once done, you can forward it to the producer to request the update.

upgrade.label: Update
upgrade.notAllCheckboxCheckedTooltip: To update, check all the boxes above

dialogClonePurpose.title: Confirm purpose cloning
dialogClonePurpose.description: A new draft purpose will be created with the same characteristics as the selected one. Select the e-service to associate it with.

dialogCreateAgreementDraft.title: Create draft service request
dialogCreateAgreementDraft.description: Do you want to create a draft service request for the e-service {{eserviceName}}, version {{eserviceVersion}}? Select the party for which to submit the request

certifiedAttributesAlert.title: It is not possible to request the consumption of the e-service
certifiedAttributesAlert.description: The selected party does not have the certified attributes required to request the consumption of the e-service

dialogDeleteOperator.title: Forwarding to Members Area for user removal
dialogDeleteOperator.description: Operations on users across all products managed by PagoPA are carried out through the Members Area portal. By clicking "confirm", you will be redirected to the Members Area page to manage the selected user.

dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.title: Confirm user removal
dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.description: By clicking “confirm”, the current user will be removed from the current client and will no longer have access. For continuity, all keys uploaded by this user will remain available in the client. For security reasons, it is recommended to replace them and delete the old ones. Have questions? <1>Read the guide</1>.

content.description: If you revoke the attribute {{attributeName}} from the party {{tenantName}}, it will lose access to all e-services for which it has an active service request, immediately interrupting the consumption of the service.
content.checkbox: I confirm that I understand the consequences of the revocation

drawerRejectReason.title: Rejection reason
drawerRejectReason.defaultServiceString:
---

Thank you for your cooperation,

the Interoperability Team.
drawerRejectReason.guideLinkLabel: For further questions and information. Go to the manual.

dialogSetTenantMail.title: Enter contact email
dialogSetTenantMail.description: The entered address has no legal value. It will be displayed on PDND as a point of reference to facilitate the direct exchange of information between parties (e.g. requests for support and clarification, etc.)

dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.title: Confirm user removal
dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.description: The current user will be removed from the current keychain and will no longer have access. All keys uploaded by this person will remain available in the keychain. It is recommended to replace them and delete the old ones. To learn more, <1>read the guide</1>

dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.title: Confirm public key deletion
dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.description: The key will no longer be usable to sign responses to consumers of your e-services. To learn more, <1>read the guide</1>.

content.description: Please note that it is necessary to have been appointed as Data Processor of personal data, with the signing of the deed required by art. 28 of the GDPR, before carrying out any processing activity through the infrastructure on behalf of the Delegator, Data Controller.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason for rejecting the delegation. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

content.description: The delegate will lose management of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with delegation for producing, and of the service requests and purposes associated with it. The e-service will return under your control in the state it is in at the time of revocation. Have questions? <1>Check the guide.
content.checkbox: I have read and want to proceed with the revocation

content.description:
By revoking the delegation, you will take possession of the requests and purposes created by the delegate for consuming on behalf of your party and you will be able to manage them independently, or create a new delegation. Have questions? <1>Check the guide.

Once the revocation has taken place, you will need to reactivate and/or create the purposes and associate your clients to be able to access the data of the e-service {{eserviceName}} with delegation for consuming again.
content.checkbox: I have read and want to proceed with the revocation

dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Reject publication
dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.description: The reason for your rejection will be communicated to your delegate, who will be able to update the draft and send it back to you for approval for publication.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason for rejecting the publication. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Publish version
dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.description: You are about to publish a new version of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with delegation for producing prepared by your delegate {{delegateName}}. At the same time, you approve the risk analyses compiled by the delegate acting on your behalf.

dropzone.label: Drag the file here or click to select it from your computer

apiInfoSection.title: Interoperability API
apiInfoSection.content: Useful parameters to obtain information programmatically through <1>your API Interop clients</1>

content.uat: Testing environment. Do not use real data.
content.att: Validation environment for private parties: be aware that data must not be real

maintenanceBanner.bodySingleDay: PDND Interoperability will undergo scheduled maintenance on {{maintenanceStartDay}} at {{maintenanceStartHour}} for approximately {{hoursDuration}} hours. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
maintenanceBanner.bodyMultipleDay: PDND Interoperability will undergo scheduled maintenance from {{maintenanceStartHour}} on {{maintenanceStartDay}} to {{maintenanceEndHour}} on {{maintenanceEndDay}}. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purpose
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and complete the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questionnaire questions will vary based on the answers provided as you proceed. Changing the answer to a previous question may change the subsequent questions.
riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Warning: do not enter personal data in free text fields

eserviceTemplateRiskAnalysis.title: Indicate who will be able to use the following risk analysis
eserviceTemplateRiskAnalysis.description: Indicate for whom the following risk analysis is being completed.

tenantKind.labelPA: Public Administrations (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letter “a” of the Digital Administration Code)
tenantKind.labelNotPA: Public service managers, Publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letters “b” and “c”) or Private entities

routeLabels.SUBSCRIBE_INTEROP_M2M_CLIENT_KEY_EDIT: Manage API Interop client public key
